channel.title: {RST}RuneStuff{RST}-By M00 M00 PK[RECRUITING]
channel.description:
[center]{RST}RuNeStUfF{RST}[/center] [size=20pt]NewsFlash: I am no longer Co-Leader, i am the owner of RuneStuff, i fired SLITTER.8, Due to doing nothing.[/size]
Welcome to the RuneStuff development topic. We are recruiting staff for a brand new server and online community, wich will be released in a PM.
We're Currently Recruiting:
[b]ServerCoders: -zez1ma boy [HeadServerCoder] -
ClientCoders: -[HeadClientCoder] -
ForumStaff(NoneApplicable) - - - - Hosters: - - [/b]
[i] Heres how to join! [/i]
[code][b]WhatRoleWouldYouLike:[/b] [b]AreYouDedicated:[/b] [b]HowMuchWillYouBeOnline:[/b] [/code]
[b]Since our hoster left us, runestuff had been forgotten. So we need applications for hosters mainly, and we're hiring client coders, but the client needs to be a webclient. We're more focused on settling our differences with the team at the moment, but please apply apply apply![/b]
[size=20pt]NewsFlash: Im in America, so i will have lots of downtime atm. But the hoster SHOULD keep it running for as long as he/she can.[/size]

item.description:

Hart, you’re accepted. We will begin when i come back from America
Same for all the staff, we will begin work, around the 1st January.

Si, your not accepted, because forum staff is non applicable.

[size=20pt]NewsFlash: I am no longer Co-Leader, i am the owner of RuneStuff, i fired SLITTER.8, Due to doing nothing.[/size]

Welcome to the RuneStuff development topic.
We are recruiting staff for a brand new server and online community, wich will be released in a PM.

We’re Currently Recruiting:

[b]ServerCoders:
-zez1ma boy [HeadServerCoder]

[/b]


Heres how to join!

Since our hoster left us, runestuff had been forgotten. So we need applications for hosters mainly, and we’re hiring client coders, but the client needs to be a webclient. We’re more focused on settling our differences with the team at the moment, but please apply apply apply!
